thread.title_full: Kelly Clarkson Reveals She's Having a Boy Like She's Your Giddy Friend on Facebook

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Kelly Clarkson Reveals She's Having a Boy Like She's Your Giddy Friend on Facebook
text:
Having made an L.A. concert audience cry by revealing that she was pregnant in August, Kelly Clarkson upped her game on Instagram today when announcing that she's expecting a baby boy.
In other news, River's gonna have a little baby brother :) #itsaboy We're so excited!
A photo posted by Kelly Clarkson (@kellyclarkson) on Oct 23, 2015 at 8:59am PDT
 Along with an adorable picture of 1-year-old daughter River Rose Blackstock, Quote: : "In other news, River's gonna have a little baby brother :) #itsaboy We're so excited!"
The American Idol winner and husband Brandon Blackstock celebrated the arrival of their daughter River back in the summer of 2014. Today's announcement is welcome happy news for Kelly, who recently had to cancel U.S. and Canadian tour dates to go on vocal rest.
More From Cosmopolitan Watch the music video for Clarkson's "Invincible" below:
